content.rendered:
beauty bar in leslieville | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in leslieville, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!

buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up

Get Directions

show options hide options

Fetching directions......

Print directions
beauty bar in leslieville | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 916 queen street east toronto, ontario
  • 416-613-0252
  • leslieville@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon.: closed

tue. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat. - sun: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Komal's pedi was wonderful!! She was attentive to what I wanted and pleasant to chat with. Clean environment and staff checked in about needing anything while waiting. I'll be back for sure!
Pat Mc
1720886534
Great experience all around. I chose to get “the pedi” with the callus remover add-on. It was a great value in my opinion- easy in and out service. My technician was Chantell. The staff were very friendly and professional.
Gabrielle Trebb
1720583971
Ashley P is who i see to get my nails done biab and gel manicure and my pedicures, she also does my laser hair removal. My nails are always perfect she does very detailed cuticle work and flawless polish application. I highly recommend booking with her for your mani/pedi! She is sweet,kindhearted and easy to talk with I always enjoy my service.
Ashley SugarRush
1714045839
I had the dermaplane peel + facial for the first time. Ashley was fantastic. I will definitely go back.
Catherine Lavoie
1708458573
It’s fine, but there are often hiccups in the service. For example, yet again I book with a specific tech only to get to my appointment and they’ve moved things around so that I am no longer with the requested technician. Today they didn’t acknowledge the error until at the end of the appointment when the woman who helped me make the booking came out and was confused as to why I was no longer with my requested technician. I honestly find too many inconsistencies to recommend them to people in the area looking for a nail place. But if you go, I’m sure you’ll get fine service. It’s fine, but given the price, it’s not “wow amazing”.
Inka Nito
1698514488
That was my first time trying this salon brand. Well, pictures speak to themselves. Smudging aside, the quality of the nail polish application is relatively poor - highlighted the details that don’t look professional to me - uneven zigzag application near the cuticle, a large gap between where nail polish starts and the cuticle. There were many bubbles on the surface too. This can’t be a 70$ pedicure. I want my money back.Update: I got my money back, thank you! I was offered to come back to re-do my pedicure, which I declined, though thanks for the offer.
Elvira D.
1634676773
‹
›
